channel.title: issue starting Whonix - gave up waiting for root device
channel.description:
Hi, apologies if this is in the wrong section. I have tried to install whonix multiple times and keep getting the same result shown below.. any ideas how I might fix this? thanks.
http://imgur.com/a/X8uvo

item.title: issue starting Whonix - gave up waiting for root device
item.dc:creator: Gavin
item.description:
Thanks for the quick reply, yes I ensured it was the full installer and yes the issue appears in both virtual machines.

UPDATE: I just tried again after writing this post and for some reason the installation is working. I didnt change any settings.

Read full topic

item.title: issue starting Whonix - gave up waiting for root device
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Sorry but did you verify Whonix? Adding to that, is this error found both on the Gateway and Workstation or just on one of the two?

Have a nice day,

Ego
